contest-event.event-date:
May 29, 1965 D Scottish Championship (Second Section)
Scottish Championship (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest Scottish Championship scottish-championship-second-section National Championship of Great Britain (Second Section Final)
Scotland
Second
Romeo & Juliet [Gounod arr. Hawkins]
Langlands Primary School (Hall), Forfar, Angus, Scotland, UK 8 bands played.
In this year a separate Scottish Area Qualifying contest was held, in the usual February slot in Edinburgh; this separated Scottish Championship contest moved to May.
Bathgate Public are added by hand to the original programme. Were they perhaps accidentally omitted due to confusion with Armadale Public, with whom they shared a conductor in 1965 (Richard Pritchard) and were alphabetically adjacent?
Oct. 20, 2011, 2:04 p.m. Feb. 22, 2015, 10:36 a.m.
1 Lochgelly Band Archie Smith
2 Broxburn Silver Harry Holwill
3 Dunfermline Town Albert Badrick
4 Cupar Town Duncan Campbell
5 Wellesley Colliery Band Albert Badrick
6 Alloa Burgh Robert Stein
7 Bathgate Band Unknown
8 Dalkeith Burgh Robert Gray
Withdrawn Armadale Burgh Richard Pritchard
Withdrawn Monklands Youth Concert Brass Charles Telfer
